name: Sara's School Life
description:
Sara's School Life is a mobile (Android) and PC Yandere Simulator Fan-game. It's not a commercial game, just something I'm working on for fun.

RULES WHEN COMMENTING:
1. No Drama.
2. No "This game is better than YS" crap.
3. Don't ask for this game to be it's own thing, it's a Yandere Simulator Fan-Game and will remain that way.
4. Before asking questions, please make sure that your question wasn't already answered in a previous video.
5. Don't ask for a download link. It will come out when it's ready.

Sara's School Life is a PC and Android Yandere Simulator Fan-game. It's not a commercial game, just something I'm working on for fun. Keep in mind everything in this video is subject to change, and that I'm also using placeholder assets for certain things.

This game contains violence, blood, and strong language and is not suitable for children. I do not endorse violence in school. Do not reenact this game in real life!
